title: Login button not responding on mobile devices
description: When users attempt to log in on mobile devices, the login button does not respond to taps. This prevents users from accessing their accounts on mobile.

reproductionSteps.step: Open the application on a mobile device (iOS or Android)

reproductionSteps.expectedResult: Login form is displayed with username, password fields and login button

reproductionSteps.step: Enter valid credentials and tap the login button
reproductionSteps.expectedResult: User is authenticated and redirected to dashboard
reproductionSteps.actualResult: Button does not respond to tap, no visual feedback, no action occurs
